about_the_game:
World Music at your Fingertips.

♫ Play exotic music from around the world.

🔥 Feel the rhythm beat in your fingers.

🌎 Music from renowned world artists:
~~ DJ Drez - Indian fusion soundscapes
~~ David Charrier - handpan harmonics
~~ Burning Babylon - dub roots riddim
~~ Kaissa - Afrobeat soul
~~ plus Maneli Jamal, Eliyahu Sills, Rhythm Scott, AEROPLANES, Hola Hola and more!

Coming to Steam in late 2020...

A portion of Turtoa profits will be donated to the Sea Turtle Conservancy, the world’s oldest sea turtle research and conservation group.
detailed_description:
World Music at your Fingertips.

♫ Play exotic music from around the world.

🔥 Feel the rhythm beat in your fingers.

🌎 Music from renowned world artists:
~~ DJ Drez - Indian fusion soundscapes
~~ David Charrier - handpan harmonics
~~ Burning Babylon - dub roots riddim
~~ Kaissa - Afrobeat soul
~~ plus Maneli Jamal, Eliyahu Sills, Rhythm Scott, AEROPLANES, Hola Hola and more!

Coming to Steam in late 2020...

A portion of Turtoa profits will be donated to the Sea Turtle Conservancy, the world’s oldest sea turtle research and conservation group.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or later
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Turtoa: Global Rhythm Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Feel the rhythm of exotic cultures and amazing instruments in this beautiful aquatic world music game.
